messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] how to find a good doctor
messages.msgSnippet: ... OR ... you ... time. ... What do you look for when you re trying to find a good naturopath or homeopath? Is there any question you could ask that would
messages.messageBody:
starsuncloud@... wrote:
>
> << I'd like to find a homeopath too. What qualifications should I look at
> when looking for one? >>
>
> It's gonna be tough where you live Shyrley. If you get up to the Portland,
OR
> area there are some really GREAT ones. I'll give you recommendations if
you
> think that's a possibility. The naturopath we went to that did testing was
> incredible. Nailed every substance right and had us healthy again in no
time.
>
> Ren


What do you look for when you're trying to find a good naturopath or
homeopath?
Is there any question you could ask that would narrow down a good or bad
natural doc?
We seem to have so many here, I don't know where to start.
And I've tried asking around for recommendations, and haven't got very far
with that, either.
I'd appreciate your input, or anyone who knows how to find a good doctor.

Karin
